title: Braking System Maintenance
author: Gustavo Ruiz
editorData:
For making a basic maintenance to the braking system, we're gonna follow these steps:

  • Use Personal Protection Equipment
  • Check the manufacturer workshop manual
  • Follow the processes established in the workshop

Use PPE

In the automotive service, we need to use Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) to ensure safety.

Check the workshop manual

Refer to the manufacturer workshop manual for detailed instructions.
